com.SoftWoehr.JaXWT
Interface TextFiler

All Known Implementing Classes:
EditPanePanelFiler, IFSTextFiler, EditPanelFiler
public interface TextFiler

An interface representing a filer of text. The interface implementer defineds where text is found.

Version:
$Id: TextFiler.java,v 1.1.1.1 2001/08/21 02:43:37 jwoehr Exp $
Author:
jax

Method Detail

save

public boolean save(java.io.File f,
                    int encoding)
Save some text to a file.
Parameters:
f - The File to which to save the text
encoding - The character encoding of the File.
Returns:
True iff saved.

open

public boolean open(java.io.File f,
                    int encoding)
Open a file in some predefined area
Parameters:
f - The File to open into a text region.
encoding - The character encoding of the File.
Returns:
True iff opened.

insert

public boolean insert(java.io.File f,
                      int encoding,
                      int position)
Insert a file in some area at some offset
Parameters:
f - The File to read and insert into a text region.
encoding - The File's character encoding.
position - The position in the text region to insert the File's contents.
Returns:
True iff inserted.
